Interface Rhomb

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Join, SimpleRhomb

    public interface Rhomb
    An interface representing a rhomb in a patch. These rhombs may move relative to one another.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void collapse()
      Remove this Rhomb.

      Produce a lightweight version of this.

      String representation for gap.

      Shift the Rhomb by a given vector.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        int getType()
        Return an integer indicating the congruence class of rhomb.
        Returns:
        The congruence class of the shape this represents. It is the smallest angle in the rhomb, expressed as an integer multiple of pi/Point.N().

      • getAngle

        int getAngle()
        Return an integer indicating the angle of the rhomb.
        Returns:
        The angle of rotation of this.

      • getPoint

        Point getPoint()
        Getter method.
        Returns:
        The point.

      • onEdge

        boolean onEdge()
        Determine if this Rhomb is on the edge of the patch.
        Returns:
        true if it's on the edge of the patch.

      • collapse

        void collapse()
        Remove this Rhomb. This method should only be used if this is on an edge.

      • shift

        void shift(Point vector)
        Shift the Rhomb by a given vector.
        Parameters:
        vector - The vector by which we shift this.

      • getRhomb

        SimplePolygon2D getRhomb()
        Getter method.
        Returns:
        A list of polygon objects containing the 2d rhomb that this Rhomb represents. (2 coordinates.)

      • setScale

        void setScale(double s)
        Set the scale for drawing.
        Parameters:
        s - The new scale used to draw this rhomb.

      • getScale

        double getScale()
        Get the scale for drawing.
        Returns:
        The scale for drawing.

      • createSimpleRhomb

        SimpleRhomb createSimpleRhomb()
        Produce a lightweight version of this.
        Returns:
        A SimpleRhomb containing all the essential data from this.

      • gapString

        java.lang.String gapString()
        String representation for gap.
        Returns:
        A String containing various internal variables, formatted for use in gap.

      • postscriptString

        java.lang.String postscriptString()
        String representation for postscript.
        Returns:
        A String giving instructions for how to draw this in Postscript.
